---
title: "Data"
---

The flight data made available (i.e.,`FLIGHT`, `EVENT` and `MEASUREMENT` tables) is published under the **[Open Performance Data Initiative (OPDI)](https://www.opdi.aero/)** as sponsored by
the **[Performance Review Commission](https://ansperformance.eu/about/prc/)** and in collaboration with the **[OpenSky Network (OSN)](https://opensky-network.org/)**. 

The first data release contains limited flight events from `start-date` until `end-date`. Download the data here: 

| Table Reference | Description | Data Source(s) | Download Link |
|-----------------|-------------|-------------|---------------|
| `FLIGHT` | Flight list | [OSN](https://opensky-network.org/) / [PRC](https://ansperformance.eu/about/prc/) | [Link](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTTP_404) |
| `EVENT` | Flight events | [OSN](https://opensky-network.org/) / [PRC](https://ansperformance.eu/about/prc/) | [Link](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTTP_404) |
| `MEASUREMENT` | Measurements associated to flight events | [OSN](https://opensky-network.org/) / [PRC](https://ansperformance.eu/about/prc/) | [Link](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTTP_404) |
| `AIRPORT` | Airports | [OurAirports](https://ourairports.com/) | [Link](https://davidmegginson.github.io/ourairports-data/airports.csv) |
| `RUNWAY` | Runways | [OurAirports](https://ourairports.com/) | [Link](https://davidmegginson.github.io/ourairports-data/navaids.csv) |

To find all info: [Readme.txt](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/HTTP_404)

::: {.callout-note appearance="simple"}

## Future releases

Further data will be made available in upcoming iterations. These updates will cover an extended time frame, additional flight event and measurement types, and additional flight events and measurements from different trajectory sources.
:::

## Retrieving Data on Trajectories

Given the `FLIGHT` table, one can, when the data `source` is `OpenSky Network (OSN)` fetch the trajectory from the publicly available OpenSky Network history database if needed. Based on the available `icao24` or `callsign`, `first_seen` and `last_seen` one can perform a query to fetch the data. 

The following tools are available for such queries: [https://opensky-network.org/data/data-tools](https://opensky-network.org/data/data-tools).
